arg.name: mock_hardware
arg.description: Choose if to start mock hardware or real hardware for Fanuc robot.

arg.name: robot_ip
arg.description: IP address of the robot controller.

arg.name: robot_series
arg.description: Robot model series (m20, m10, lrmate, crx, r1000, r2000)

arg.name: prefix
arg.description: Robot model series (m20, m10, lrmate, crx, r1000, r2000)

let.name: robot_description_content
let.value: $(command '$(find-exec xacro) $(find-pkg-share b_robotized_fanuc_demo)/urdf/fanuc_test.urdf.xacro \ mock_hardware:=$(var mock_hardware) \ robot_ip:=$(var robot_ip) \ robot_model:=$(var robot_model) \ robot_series:=$(var robot_series) \ prefix:=$(var prefix) ')
